newsitem.title: USA: TWA October load factor down.
newsitem.headline: TWA October load factor down.

text.p: Trans World Airlines Inc said on Wednesday its load factor fell to 63.4 percent in October from 64.0 percent a year ago.
Total available seat miles in October were 3.49 billion, up from 3.30 billion a year ago, and revenue passenger miles were 2.22 billion, up from 2.11 billion a year ago, the airline said.

For the year through October, load factor was 67.6 percent, up from 66.2 percent a year ago. Available seat miles were 34.20 billion, up from 31.81 billion a year ago, the ailrine said. Revenue passenger miles were 23.12 billion for the year through October, up from 21.07 billion a year ago.
